name: Go - An Adversarial,Opening Strategy,Board Game
description:
Go is an adversarial, opening strategy, board game for two players that originated in China more than 2,500 years ago. The goal of the game is to surround more territory than your opponent does. Now this software can let you play with your computer. You can enjoy it to play with your computer. It is very helpful for you to study and improve your go skills.

Features hightlights:
1. Play with your computer with artificial intelligence, it is really free for you to enjoy.

2.Multiple board sizes include 9x9、11x11、13x13 and 19x19 .

2. Handicap functions.

3. Automatic score calculation.

4. Realistic sound effects.

5. You can reset the game,take back or change a move anytime.

6. It is very useful for those who are the complete beginners to understand and study go game.

7. 100% Pure Software
Go will not do anything without your permission. It won’t automatically send any files to internet, collect your personal data or install any bundled software.

Feedback:
Any suggestion will be appreciated, support email: 459788263@qq.com
